Text: ERCOTs XML Interface has been down since amERCOTs XML Interface has been down since am They have a database problem and do not know when they will fix it This will affect all realtime data coming from ERCOT The Report Query webscraper will not be affected The schedules submission etc will be affected Valentin

OOM deploymentHello Mark Patterson send us OOMC deployment through email and we found we were being send empty MCP in OOMC deployments messages as a result we were not able to receive itNow we are also accomodating empty MCP tags and we have tested itwe will be doing further testing today when ercot will be sending us OOMC deployments Thankx Sasha
